description: KO 加速器 (KOInstall) - 客户端安装器

script: # Extract embedded 7z resource from the SFX/exe using 7z (makes installation portable)

notes: This installer is an executable SFX containing a 7z archive; manifest extracts files using 7z to the app folder. After install, you may need to pick the correct exe under the extracted folders (e.g. under 'bin' or 'console').
